casebody.data:
Monday, January 29, 1996

DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

95-2602. Disciplinary Counsel v. Spriggs.

On motion for order to show cause. Motion granted; David Nicholas Spriggs II of Columbus, Ohio, Attorney Registration No. 0061541, is indefinitely suspended from the practice of law pending notification by Disciplinary Counsel that respondent has appeared, given testimony, and produced all documents and things as commanded by the previously issued subpoena duces tecum and as requested by relator’s previous letters of inquiry.
